TranslationItem.Name: label1
TranslationItem.Source:
Supported commandline arguments:
browse [path] [-filter=] about add addfiles apply applypatch blame [file] branch checkout checkoutbranch checkoutrevision cherry cleanup clone [path] commit [--quiet] filehistory [file] fileeditor [file] formatpatch gitbash gitignore init [path] merge [--branch name] mergeconflicts [--quiet] mergetool [--quiet] openrepo [file] [-filter=] pull [--rebase] [--merge] [--fetch] [--quiet] push [--quiet] rebase [--branch name] remotes revert [filename] searchfile settings stash synchronize [--rebase] [--merge] [--fetch] [--quiet] tag viewdiff
TranslationItem.Value:
支持的命令行參數：
browse add addfiles apply applypatch branch checkout checkoutbranch checkoutrevision init clone [path] commit filehistory [file] formatpatch pull push settings viewdiff rebase merge cherry tag stash

TranslationItem.Name: label2
TranslationItem.Source: You can only delete branches when they are fully merged in HEAD. When you delete a branch the commits can get lost because nothing point to them. When you want to delete a not-fully merged branch, you can override this using `force delete´.
TranslationItem.Value: 您只能刪除已經在HEAD中完全合併的分支。 如果您刪除一分支，對應的提交會丟失，因為已經沒有分支指向它們了。 如果您想刪除一個沒有完全合併的分支，請選中“強制刪除”

TranslationItem.Name: richTextBox1
TranslationItem.Source:
Donate
You can help by making a financial contribution to the project. Donations will be used to cover the costs of hosting a website and to get the resources needed to keep the project running.
Click on the "Support this project" button to get more information about making a donation.
TranslationItem.Value:
捐贈
你可以通過捐贈對此專案作出財務方面的貢獻。捐款將用於支付架設網站的成本和該專案保持運行的資源。點擊“支持本專案”按鈕來獲取有關捐贈的更多訊息。

Specify filepatterns you want git to ignore.

例如： Henk Westhuis <Henk@.(none)> Henk Westhuis <henk_westhuis@hotmail.com>

TranslationItem.Name: _strategyTooltipText
TranslationItem.Source:
resolve This can only resolve two heads (i.e. the current branch and another branch you pulled from) using a 3-way merge algorithm. It tries to carefully detect criss-cross merge ambiguities and is considered generally safe and fast.
recursive This can only resolve two heads using a 3-way merge algorithm. When there is more than one common ancestor that can be used for 3-way merge, it creates a merged tree of the common ancestors and uses that as the reference tree for the 3-way merge. Additionally this can detect and handle merges involving renames. This is the default merge strategy when pulling or merging one branch.
octopus This resolves cases with more than two heads, but refuses to do a complex merge that needs manual resolution. It is primarily meant to be used for bundling topic branch heads together. This is the default merge strategy when pulling or merging more than one branch.
ours This resolves any number of heads, but the resulting tree of the merge is always that of the current branch head, effectively ignoring all changes from all other branches. It is meant to be used to supersede old development history of side branches.
subtree This is a modified recursive strategy. When merging trees A and B, if B corresponds to a subtree of A, B is first adjusted to match the tree structure of A, instead of reading the trees at the same level. This adjustment is also done to the common ancestor tree.
TranslationItem.Value:
解析（resolve） 使用三向合併算法，只能解決兩頭合併（比如當前分支和你“拉”操作的來源分支）。 此策略會小心的檢測出交叉合併的二義性，總體來說是安全且快速的。
遞歸（recursive） 使用三向合併算法，只能解決兩頭合併。當兩個分支至少有一個共同祖先能夠使用三向合併的時候，此策略會為所有共同祖先建立一個合併樹並且把這棵樹當做三向合併的引用樹。除此以外，此策略還可以檢測和處理重命名的的合併。此策略是“拉”操作和合併單個分支的默認策略。
章魚（octopus） 此策略可以解決大於兩頭的合併，但是會拒絕需要手動解析的複雜合併。主要的作用是把幾個主要的功用分支綁在一起。此策略是“拉”操作和合併多個分支的默認策略。
排外（ours） 此策略可以解決任意頭合併，但是在合併的結果樹中總是保持當前分支的頭，對於忽略一切其他分支的改變的情況來說極其有效。此策略可以用來接替舊的開發歷史中的副分支。
子樹（subtree） 此策略是修改的遞歸策略。當合併A樹和B樹時，如果B樹對應A的一個子樹，B首先會被調整到設和A樹結構的位置，而不是進行同級別的對比。這種調整也會應用在公共祖先樹上。

TranslationItem.Name: fastForward
TranslationItem.Source: Keep a single branch line if possible (fast forward)

TranslationItem.Name: NonDefaultMergeStrategy
TranslationItem.Value: 使用非預設的合併策略

TranslationItem.Source: Are all merge conflicts solved? Do you want to commit?
TranslationItem.Value: 所有的合併衝突都解決了嗎？要不要提交？

TranslationItem.Name: _applyShashedItemsAgain
TranslationItem.Source: Apply stashed items to working dir again?
TranslationItem.Value: 要把隱藏的目標再次應用到工作目錄嗎？

TranslationItem.Name: _areYouSureYouWantToRebaseMerge
TranslationItem.Source: The current commit is a merge. Are you sure you want to rebase this merge?

TranslationItem.Name: _cannotLoadPutty
TranslationItem.Source: Cannot load SSH key. PuTTY is not configured properly.
TranslationItem.Value: 無法載入SSH密鑰。 PuTTY設定的不正確。

TranslationItem.Name: _fetchAllBranchesCanOnlyWithFetch
TranslationItem.Source: You can only fetch all remote branches (*) without merge or rebase. If you want to fetch all remote branches, choose fetch. If you want to fetch and merge a branch, choose a specific branch.
TranslationItem.Value: 如果不使用合併(merge)或者衍合(rebase)，你只能把整個遠端分支(*)都提取過來。如果你想獲取所有遠端分支，那就選擇提取。如果你想獲取和合併某一個分支，那就選擇這個特定的分支。

TranslationItem.Name: _questionInitSubmodules
TranslationItem.Source: The pulled has submodules configured. Do you want to initialize the submodules? This will initialize and update all submodules recursive.

TranslationItem.Name: _selectRemoteRepository
TranslationItem.Value: 請選擇一個遠端版本庫

TranslationItem.Name: Fetch
TranslationItem.Source: Do not merge, only &fetch remote changes
TranslationItem.Value: 不合併，只獲取遠端分支

TranslationItem.Name: Merge
TranslationItem.Value: 遠端分支合併到當前分支(&M)

TranslationItem.Name: Rebase
TranslationItem.Source: &Rebase current branch on top of remote branch, creates linear history (use with caution)
TranslationItem.Value: 衍合(Rebase)遠端分支到當前分支，建立線性歷史記錄。 建議使用時選擇一個遠端分支。 （謹慎使用）(&R)

TranslationItem.Name: _branchNewForRemote
TranslationItem.Source: The branch you are about to push seems to be a new branch for the remote. Are you sure you want to push this branch?
TranslationItem.Value: 您將要推送的這個分支對於遠端來說似乎是個新的分支。 您確認要推動這個分支嗎？

TranslationItem.Name: _cannotLoadPutty
TranslationItem.Source: Cannot load SSH key. PuTTY is not configured properly.
TranslationItem.Value: 無法載入SSH密鑰。 PuTTY配定的不正確​​。

TranslationItem.Name: _selectRemote
TranslationItem.Value: 請選擇一個遠端版本庫

TranslationItem.Name: _selectTag
TranslationItem.Source: You need to select a tag to push or select "Push all tags".
TranslationItem.Value: 您需要選擇一個標籤來推送，或者您可以選擇“推送所有標籤。”

TranslationItem.Name: BranchTab
TranslationItem.Source: Push branches and commits to remote repository.
TranslationItem.Value: 推送分支然後提交到遠端版本庫

TranslationItem.Name: RemoteBranch
TranslationItem.Value: 嚴重:不是git的版本庫(或是任一上層目錄):.git

TranslationItem.Name: TagTab
TranslationItem.Value: 推送標籤到遠端版本庫

TranslationItem.Name: lblMustAuthenticate
TranslationItem.Source: You must authenticate to run this command.

TranslationItem.Name: lblPleaseLoadKey
TranslationItem.Source: Please load your SSH private key

TranslationItem.Name: _branchUpToDateText
TranslationItem.Source: Current branch a is up to date. Nothing to rebase.

TranslationItem.Name: label1
TranslationItem.Source: Rebase current branch on top of another branch
TranslationItem.Value: 將當前分支衍合到另一分支頂部

TranslationItem.Name: maxRecentRepositories
TranslationItem.Source: Maximum number of most recent repositories

TranslationItem.Name: _questionAutoPullBehaviour
TranslationItem.Source: You have added a new remote repository. Do you want to automatically configure the default push and pull behavior for this remote?

TranslationItem.Name: _questionDeleteRemote
TranslationItem.Source: Are you sure you want to delete this remote?

TranslationItem.Name: _remoteBranchDataError
TranslationItem.Source: Invalid ´{1}´ found for branch ´{0}´. Value has been reset to empty value.

TranslationItem.Name: _warningValidRemote
TranslationItem.Source: You need to configure a valid url for this remote

TranslationItem.Name: tabPage2
TranslationItem.Value: 預設拉取動作(獲取與合併)

TranslationItem.Name: UpdateBranch
TranslationItem.Value: 更新所有遠端分支資訊

TranslationItem.Name: label1
TranslationItem.Source: Are you sure you want to reset your changes?

TranslationItem.Name: label2
TranslationItem.Source: This will delete any uncommitted work.

TranslationItem.Name: Hard
TranslationItem.Source: Hard: reset working dir and index (discard ALL local changes, even uncommitted changes)
TranslationItem.Value: 強迫模式：重置工作目錄和索引（放棄所有的本機修改，甚至未提交的修改）

TranslationItem.Name: Mixed
TranslationItem.Source: Mixed: leave working dir untouched, reset index
TranslationItem.Value: 混合模式：不動工作目錄，只是重置索引

TranslationItem.Name: resetHardWarning
TranslationItem.Source: You are about to discard ALL local changes, are you sure?
TranslationItem.Value: 您將要放棄所有的本機修改，你確定嗎？

TranslationItem.Name: Soft
TranslationItem.Source: Soft: leave working dir and index untouched
TranslationItem.Value: 軟模式：保持工作目錄和索引均不變

TranslationItem.Name: allConflictsResolved
TranslationItem.Source: All mergeconflicts are resolved, you can commit. Do you want to commit now?
TranslationItem.Value: 所有合併衝突都解決了，你可以提交了。 你想現在提交嗎？

TranslationItem.Name: askMergeConflictSolvedAfterCustomMergeScript
fileBinairyChooseLocalBaseRemote
TranslationItem.Source: File ({0}) appears to be a binairy file. Choose to keep the local({1}), remote({2}) or base file.
TranslationItem.Value: {0}似乎是二進位檔案。 是要保留本機檔案{1}還是遠端檔案{2}抑或是基底檔案？

TranslationItem.Name: fileChangeLocallyAndRemotely
TranslationItem.Source: The file has been changed both locally({0}) and remotely({1}). Merge the changes.
TranslationItem.Value: 本機({0})與遠端({1})都有修改，合併修改。

TranslationItem.Name: fileCreatedLocallyAndRemotely
TranslationItem.Source: A file with the same name has been created locally({0}) and remotely({1}). Choose the file you want to keep or merge the files.
TranslationItem.Value: 本機({0})與遠端({1})都有同名檔案，選擇你要留的檔案或是合併。

TranslationItem.Name: fileCreatedLocallyAndRemotelyLong
TranslationItem.Source:
File {0} does not have a base revision. A file with the same name has been created locally({1}) and remotely({2}) causing this conflict.
Choose the file you want to keep, merge the files or delete the file?
TranslationItem.Value:
{0}沒有基底版本 本機({1})遠端({2})都建立相同檔案名稱，這造成衝突，
請選擇保留一個檔案、合併檔案或是刪除檔案？

TranslationItem.Name: fileDeletedLocallyAndModifiedRemotely
TranslationItem.Source: The file has been deleted locally({0}) and modified remotely({1}). Choose to delete the file or keep the modified version.
TranslationItem.Value: 本機({0})刪除此檔案，而遠端({1})有修改，請選擇刪除檔案或是保留修改的檔案？

TranslationItem.Name: fileDeletedLocallyAndModifiedRemotelyLong
TranslationItem.Source:
File {0} does not have a local revision. The file has been deleted locally({1}) but modified remotely({2}).
Choose to delete the file or keep the modified version.
TranslationItem.Value:
{0}沒有本機版本 本機({1})刪除此檔案，而遠端({2})有修改
請選擇要刪除此檔案或是保留修改的版本？

TranslationItem.Name: fileIsBinary
TranslationItem.Source: The selected file appears to be a binary file. Are you sure you want to open this file in {0}?
TranslationItem.Value: 所選定的檔案似乎是一個二進位檔案。您確定要用{0}開啟這個文件嗎？

TranslationItem.Name: fileModifiedLocallyAndDelededRemotely
TranslationItem.Source: The file has been modified locally({0}) and deleted remotely({1}). Choose to delete the file or keep the modified version.
TranslationItem.Value: 本機({0})有修改，而遠端({1})已刪除，請選擇刪除此檔案或是保留修改的版本？

TranslationItem.Name: fileModifiedLocallyAndDelededRemotelyLong
TranslationItem.Source:
File {0} does not have a remote revision. The file has been modified locally({1}) but deleted remotely({2}).
Choose to delete the file or keep the modified version.
TranslationItem.Value:
{0}沒有遠端版本 本機({1})修改此檔案，與端({2})刪除此檔案
請選擇刪除此檔案或是保留修改的版本？

TranslationItem.Name: fileUnchangedAfterMerge
TranslationItem.Source:
The file has not been modified by the merge. Usually this means that the file has been saved to the wrong location.
The merge conflict will not be marked as solved. Please try again.
TranslationItem.Value:
合併後檔案沒有變化，通常是因為檔案儲存到其它地方。
合併衝突並沒有解決，請再試一次。

TranslationItem.Name: mergeConflictIsSubmodule
TranslationItem.Source: The selected mergeconflict is a submodule. Mark conflict as resolved?
TranslationItem.Value: 所選定的合併衝突是一個子模組。把衝突標記成已解決嗎？

TranslationItem.Name: noBaseRevision
TranslationItem.Source: There is no base revision for {0}. Fall back to 2-way merge?
TranslationItem.Value: {0}沒有基底版本，改用雙向合併？

TranslationItem.Name: noMergeTool
TranslationItem.Source: There is no mergetool configured. Please go to settings and set a mergetool!
TranslationItem.Value: 沒有設定mergetool。請到設定選單設定mergetool！

TranslationItem.Name: uskUseCustomMergeScript
TranslationItem.Source:
There is a custom merge script({0}) for this file type.
Do you want to use this custom merge script?
TranslationItem.Value:
有專門針對此類型的合併腳本({0})
你要用這個合併腳本嗎？

TranslationItem.Name: _adviceDiffToolConfiguration
TranslationItem.Source: You should configure a diff tool to show file diff in external program (kdiff3 for example).

TranslationItem.Name: _cantFindGitMessage
TranslationItem.Source:
The command to run git is not configured correct. You need to set the correct path to be able to use GitExtensions.
Do you want to set the correct command now?

TranslationItem.Name: _cantReadRegistry
TranslationItem.Source: GitExtensions has insufficient permissions to check the registry.

TranslationItem.Name: _cantReadRegistryAddEntryManually
_cantRegisterShellExtension
TranslationItem.Source: Could not register the shell extension because '{0}' could not be found.

TranslationItem.Name: _configureMergeTool
TranslationItem.Source: You need to configure merge tool in order to solve mergeconflicts (kdiff3 for example).

TranslationItem.Name: _customMergeToolXConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is a custom mergetool configured: {0}

TranslationItem.Name: _emailSet
TranslationItem.Source: A username and an email address are configured.

TranslationItem.Name: _gitNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: Git not found. To solve this problem you can set the correct path in settings.

TranslationItem.Name: _gitVersionFound
TranslationItem.Source: Git {0} is found on your computer.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiff3NotFoundAuto
TranslationItem.Source: Path to kdiff3 could not be found automatically. Please make sure KDiff3 is installed or set path manually.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiffAsDiffConfiguredButNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: KDiff3 is configured as difftool, but the path to kdiff.exe is not configured.

TranslationItem.Name: _kdiffAsMergeConfiguredButNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: KDiff3 is configured as mergetool, but the path to kdiff.exe is not configured.

TranslationItem.Name: _linuxToolsShNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: The path to linux tools (sh) could not be found automatically. Please make sure there are linux tools installed (through msysgit or cygwin) or set the correct path manually.

TranslationItem.Name: _linuxToolsSshFound
TranslationItem.Source: Linux tools (sh) found on your computer.

TranslationItem.Name: _linuxToolsSshNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: Linux tools (sh) not found. To solve this problem you can set the correct path in settings.

TranslationItem.Name: _mergeToolXConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is a custom mergetool configured.

TranslationItem.Name: _mergeToolXConfiguredNeedsCmd
TranslationItem.Source: {0} is configured as mergetool, this is a custom mergetool and needs a custom cmd to be configured.

TranslationItem.Name: _noDiffToolConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is no difftool configured. Do you want to configure kdiff3 as your difftool? Select no if you want to configure a different difftool yourself.

TranslationItem.Name: _noEmailSet
TranslationItem.Source: You need to configure a username and an email address.

TranslationItem.Name: _noLanguageConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is no language configured for Git Extensions.

TranslationItem.Name: _noMergeToolConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: There is no mergetool configured. Do you want to configure kdiff3 as your mergetool? Select no if you want to configure a different mergetool yourself.

TranslationItem.Name: _opensshUsed
TranslationItem.Source: Default SSH client, OpenSSH, will be used. (commandline window will appear on pull, push and clone operations)

TranslationItem.Name: _plinkputtyGenpageantNotFound
TranslationItem.Source: PuTTY is configured as SSH client but cannot find plink.exe, puttygen.exe or pageant.exe.

TranslationItem.Name: _puttyConfigured
TranslationItem.Source: SSH client PuTTY is configured properly.

TranslationItem.Name: _puttyFoundAuto
TranslationItem.Source: All paths needed for PuTTY could be automatically found and are set.

TranslationItem.Name: _shCanBeRun
TranslationItem.Source: Command sh can be run using: {0}sh

TranslationItem.Name: _shellExtNeedsToBeRegistered
TranslationItem.Source: {0} needs to be registered in order to use the shell extensions.

TranslationItem.Name: _shellExtNoInstalled
TranslationItem.Source: Shell extensions are not installed. Run the installer to install the shell extensions.

TranslationItem.Name: _solveGitCommandFailed
TranslationItem.Source: The command to run git could not be determined automatically. Please make sure git (msysgit or cygwin) is installed or set the correct command manually.

TranslationItem.Name: _toolSuggestPath
TranslationItem.Source: Please enter the path to {0} and press suggest.

TranslationItem.Name: _wrongGitVersion
TranslationItem.Source: Git found but version {0} is not supported. Upgrage to version {1} or later

TranslationItem.Name: AutostartPageant
TranslationItem.Source: Automatically start authentication client when a private key is configured for a remote
TranslationItem.Value: 當遠端配置了私鑰後，自動啟動認證客戶端

TranslationItem.Name: CheckAtStartup
TranslationItem.Source: Check settings at startup (disables automatically if all settings are correct)
TranslationItem.Value: 在啟動時檢查設定（如果所有設定均正確則自動禁用）

TranslationItem.Name: chkCloseProcessDialog
TranslationItem.Source: Close process dialog automatically when process is succeeded
TranslationItem.Value: 對話框時自動關閉進程的過程是成功

TranslationItem.Name: chkFollowRenamesInFileHistory
TranslationItem.Value: 按照文件的歷史重命名（實驗）

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowCurrentBranchInVisualStudio
TranslationItem.Source: Show current branch in Visual Studio

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowCurrentChangesInRevisionGraph
TranslationItem.Source: Show current working dir changes in revision graph (slow!)
TranslationItem.Value: 在版本圖裡顯示工作目錄的改變（慢!）

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowErrorsWhenStagingFiles
TranslationItem.Value: 顯示增加提交檔案時的錯誤

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowGitCommandLine
TranslationItem.Source: Show Git commandline dialog when executing process
TranslationItem.Value: Git的命令行對話框顯示在執行過程

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowGitStatusInToolbar
TranslationItem.Source: Show repository status in browse dialog (number of changes in toolbar, restart required)
TranslationItem.Value: 在瀏覽對話框中顯示版本庫的狀態（在工具欄上會產生一些變化，需要重新啟動）

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowRelativeDate
TranslationItem.Source: Show relative date instead of full date
TranslationItem.Value: 顯示相對日期，而不是​​完整的日期

TranslationItem.Name: chkShowStashCountInBrowseWindow
TranslationItem.Source: Show stash count on status bar in browse window
TranslationItem.Value: 在瀏覽窗口的狀態欄中顯示暫存緩衝區計數

TranslationItem.Name: chkStartWithRecentWorkingDir
TranslationItem.Source: Open last working dir on startup

TranslationItem.Name: chkUseFastChecks
TranslationItem.Source: Use FileSystemWatcher to check if index is changed
TranslationItem.Value: 使用FileSystemWatcher檢查索引是否改變了

TranslationItem.Name: chkWarnBeforeCheckout
TranslationItem.Source: Warn of not committed changes before checkout

TranslationItem.Name: DrawNonRelativesGray
TranslationItem.Value: 把無關者的顏色設為灰色

TranslationItem.Name: DrawNonRelativesTextGray
TranslationItem.Value: 把無關者的顏色設為灰色

TranslationItem.Name: globalAutoCrlfFalse
TranslationItem.Source: Checkout as-is, commit as-is ("core.autocrlf" is set to "false")
TranslationItem.Value: 簽出、提交均視為（"core.autocrlf"設定為"false"）

TranslationItem.Name: globalAutoCrlfInput
TranslationItem.Source: Checkout as-is, commit Unix-style line endings ("core.autocrlf" is set to "input")
TranslationItem.Value: 簽出視為，用Unix風格的換行符號提交（"core.autocrlf"設定為"input"）

TranslationItem.Name: globalAutoCrlfTrue
TranslationItem.Source: Checkout Windows-style, commit Unix-style line endings ("core.autocrlf" is set to "true")
TranslationItem.Value: 以windows風格簽出，用Unix風格的換行符號提交（"core.autocrlf"設定為"true"）

TranslationItem.Name: groupBox1
TranslationItem.Source: Specify which ssh client to use

TranslationItem.Name: helpLabel
TranslationItem.Source: Press F1 to see available options

TranslationItem.Name: inMenuCheckBox
TranslationItem.Source: Add to revision grid context menu
TranslationItem.Value: 加入版本網格快捷選單

TranslationItem.Name: label10
TranslationItem.Source: You need to set the correct path to git.cmd before you can change any global setting.
TranslationItem.Value: 您需要設定git.cmd正確的路徑，才能更改全體設定。

TranslationItem.Name: label11
TranslationItem.Source: The checklist below validates the basic settings needed for GitExtensions to work properly.
TranslationItem.Value: 下面的檢查列表表示保證GitExtensions正常工作所需的基本設定。

TranslationItem.Name: label12
TranslationItem.Source: Limit number of commits that will be loaded at startup.
TranslationItem.Value: 限制將在啟動時加載的提交次數。

TranslationItem.Name: label13
TranslationItem.Source: Command used to run git (git.cmd or git.exe)

TranslationItem.Name: label14
TranslationItem.Source: Path to linux tools (sh). Leave empty when it is in the path.
TranslationItem.Value: Linux工具（sh）的路徑。如果已在路徑中則留空。

TranslationItem.Name: label18
TranslationItem.Source: OpenSSH is a commandline tool. PuTTY is more userfriendly to use for windows users, but requires the PuTTY authentication client to run in the background. When OpenSSH is used, command line dialogs are shown!
TranslationItem.Value: OpenSSH是一個命令行工具。 對於Windows用戶來說，PuTTY用起來更方便，但需要在後台運行PuTTY驗證客戶端。 當使用OpenSSH時，會顯示命令行對話框！

TranslationItem.Name: label20
TranslationItem.Source: You only need local settings if you want to override the global settings for the current repository.
TranslationItem.Value: 如果你想覆蓋本版本庫的全體設定， 你只需要做本機設定就夠了。

TranslationItem.Name: label21
TranslationItem.Source: You need to set the correct path to git before you can change local settings.
TranslationItem.Value: 您需要設定git正確的路徑，才能更改本機設定。

TranslationItem.Name: label23
TranslationItem.Source: Smtp server for sending patches by email
TranslationItem.Value: 發送補丁到電子郵件所用的SMTP伺服機

TranslationItem.Name: label24
TranslationItem.Value: 版本網格快速搜尋逾時[毫秒]

TranslationItem.Name: label50
TranslationItem.Source: Git Extensions can use msysgit or cygwin to access git repositories. Set the correct paths below.
TranslationItem.Value: Git Extensions可以使用msysgit或cygwin訪問git版本庫庫。在下面的設定它們正確的路徑。

TranslationItem.Name: label51
TranslationItem.Source: The global config file located in the location stored environment variable %HOME%. By default %HOME% will be set to %HOMEDRIVE%%HOMEPATH% if empty. Change the default behaviour only if you experience problems.
TranslationItem.Value: 整體設定檔案位於%HOME%的位置。預設情形下，如果%HOME%為空，%HOME%將被設定為%HOMEDRIVE%%HOMEPATH%。 你應該只在遇到問題的時候才考慮改變預設設置。

TranslationItem.Name: label9
TranslationItem.Source: You need to set the correct path to git before you can change global settings.
TranslationItem.Value: 您需要設定git正確的路徑，才能更改全體設定。

TranslationItem.Name: localAutoCrlfFalse
TranslationItem.Source: Checkout as-is, commit as-is ("core.autocrlf" is set to "false")
TranslationItem.Value: 簽出與提交均視為（"core.autocrlf"設定為"false"）

TranslationItem.Name: localAutoCrlfInput
TranslationItem.Source: Checkout as-is, commit Unix-style line endings ("core.autocrlf" is set to "input")
TranslationItem.Value: 簽出視為用Unix風格的換行符號提交（"core.autocrlf"設定為"input"）

TranslationItem.Name: localAutoCrlfTrue
TranslationItem.Source: Checkout Windows-style, commit Unix-style line endings ("core.autocrlf" is set to "true")
TranslationItem.Value: 以windows風格簽出，用Unix風格的換行符號提交（"core.autocrlf"設定為"true"）

TranslationItem.Name: StripedBanchChange
TranslationItem.Value: 條紋化表示分支的改變

TranslationItem.Name: Apply
TranslationItem.Source: Apply selected stash to working dir
TranslationItem.Value: 把所選緩衝區應用到工作目錄

TranslationItem.Name: stashUntrackedFilesNotSupported
TranslationItem.Source: Stash untracked files is not supported in the version of msysgit you are using. Please update msysgit to at least version 1.7.7 to use this option.

TranslationItem.Name: _fingerprintNotRegistredText
TranslationItem.Source:
The fingerprint of this host is not registered by PuTTY. This causes this process to hang, and that why it is automatically stopped.
When the connection is opened detached from Git and GitExtensions, the host's fingerprint can be registered. You could also manually add the host's fingerprint or run Test Connection from the remotes dialog.
Do you want to register the host's fingerprint and restart the process?

TranslationItem.Name: _serverHotkeyNotCachedText
TranslationItem.Source:
The server's host key is not cached in the registry.
Do you want to trust this host key and then try again?

TranslationItem.Name: _removeSelectedSubmodule
TranslationItem.Source: Are you sure you want remove the selected submodule?

TranslationItem.Name: _questionContinueWithoutAuthors
TranslationItem.Source: Authors file "{0}" does not exists. Continue without authors file?

TranslationItem.Name: _questionOpenRepo
TranslationItem.Source: The repository has been cloned successfully. Do you want to open the new repository "{0}" now?

TranslationItem.Name: _noRevisionSelected
TranslationItem.Source: Select 1 revision to create the tag on.

TranslationItem.Name: _noRevisionSelected
TranslationItem.Source: Select 1 revision to create the tag on.

TranslationItem.Name: noLanguageCodeSelected
TranslationItem.Source: There is no languagecode selected. Do you want to select a language code first?

TranslationItem.Name: saveCurrentChangesText
TranslationItem.Source: Do you want to save the current changes?

TranslationItem.Name: _removeDanglingObjectsQuestion
TranslationItem.Source: Are you sure you want to delete all dangling objects?
TranslationItem.Value: 你確定要刪除所有不可讀目標？

TranslationItem.Name: _xTagsCreated
TranslationItem.Source:
{0} Tags created.
Do not forget to delete these tags when finished.
TranslationItem.Value: {0}個標記已經建立。不要忘記在完成時刪除這些標記。

TranslationItem.Name: FullCheck
TranslationItem.Source: Check not just objects in GIT_OBJECT_DIRECTORY ($GIT_DIR/objects), but also the ones found in alternate object pools.
TranslationItem.Value: 檢查不僅存在於在GIT_OBJECT_DIRECTORY($GIT_DIR/objects)目錄， 而且還存在於替代目標池的目標。

TranslationItem.Name: label1
TranslationItem.Source: Double-click on a row for quick view
TranslationItem.Value: 雙擊一列包含SHA1的來查看。

TranslationItem.Name: label2
TranslationItem.Source:
By default only unreferenced objects that are older than 2 weeks are removed when cleaning up the database. All other object are only deleted when you run "Remove all dangling objects"
Check commits you want to recover and press Recover button Context menu for additional operations
TranslationItem.Value: 預設情況下，在清理資料庫的時候， 兩週以上的未被引用的目標將會被刪除， 其他的目標只會在運行“刪除所有不可讀目標”的時候移除。

TranslationItem.Name: NoReflogs
TranslationItem.Source: Do not consider commits that are referenced only by an entry in a reflog to be reachable.
TranslationItem.Value: 不要認為在reflog中引用的提交是可取得的

TranslationItem.Name: Remove
TranslationItem.Value: 刪除所有未決定的目標

TranslationItem.Name: Unreachable
TranslationItem.Source: Print out objects that exist but that aren't readable from any of the reference nodes.
TranslationItem.Value: 輸出所有存在但是不可讀的目標

TranslationItem.Name: _areYouSureYouWantCheckout
TranslationItem.Source: Are you sure to checkout the selected revision?
TranslationItem.Value: 確定要checkout選擇的修訂版次?

TranslationItem.Name: _droppingFilesBlocked
TranslationItem.Source: For you own protection dropping more than 10 patch files at once is blocked!

TranslationItem.Name: label1
TranslationItem.Source:
There are no commits made to this repository yet.
If this is a normal repository, these steps are recommended: - Make sure you have a proper .gitignore file in your repository - Commit files using commit
If this is a central repository (bare repository without a working dir): - Push changes from another repository
TranslationItem.Value:
此版本庫中沒有任何提交。 如果此版本庫是一個常規版本庫，推薦以下步驟： - 確認版本庫中.gitgnore文件正確 - 用提交命令來提交
如果此版本庫是一個中央版本庫（沒有工作路徑的裸版本庫）： - 從其他版本庫中“推”出更改

TranslationItem.Name: label2
TranslationItem.Source: The current working dir is not a git repository.
TranslationItem.Value: 當前的工作目錄不是一個git版本庫。

TranslationItem.Name: _strCouldNotAddRemote
TranslationItem.Source: Could not add remote with name {0} and URL {1}

TranslationItem.Name: _strRemoteAlreadyExist
TranslationItem.Source: ERROR: Remote with name {0} already exists but it does not point to the same repository! Details: Is {1} expected {2}
